org.lwjgl.openal

Class OpenALException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.lwjgl.openal.OpenALException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OpenALException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    A runtime exception thrown by LWJGL when it encounters an OpenAL error. The checks that trigger this exception are only enabled when LWJGLUtil.DEBUG is true.
    See Also:
